snippet: The major domestic airlines are considering charging a $25 fee at the gate for carry-on bags that exceed size limits for an overhead bin.
abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road column observes the major domestic airlines are considering charging a $25 fee at the gate for carry-on bags that exceed posted size limits for an overhead bin.
lead_paragraph: The major domestic airlines are considering charging a $25 fee at the gate for carry-on bags that exceed size limits for an overhead bin.

headline.print_headline: Airlines Weighing Fee For Oversize Carry-Ons
headline.seo: Airlines Weighing Fee for Oversized Carry-Ons - On the Road
headline.main: Airlines Weighing Fee for Oversize Carry-Ons
